
The difference between 'affect and effect'

1.1 affect versus effect
Here is some text which is read by people like you and me. Maybe you are actually interested in the answer: https://www.merriam-webster.com/words-at-play/affect-vs-effect-usage-difference

1.2 another paragraph
We could look for more evaluation metrics.

2.0 Evaluation in NLP

2.1 BLEU score
Can you believe that BLEU is already about 19 years old? Isn't it crazy that a lot of people use this metric without any second thoughts although its inappropriateness has been shown?
